apple.title: Apple
apple.description: Over the course of 5 years at Apple, I designed and built a number of internal websites, apps, videos and games. I also worked as a front end developer on customer-facing sites on apple.com including: iMac, Mac mini, iPod touch, Apple Watch, macOS Sierra, iOS 11 and the App Store — and was assigned as lead developer on six of them.

images.alt: App Store Demo by Andy Griffin

blues.title: The Blues
blues.description: A forlorn, anthropomorphized piano keyboard that evokes the blues in this logo.

images.alt: Blues Logo by Andy Griffin

brandenburg_gate.title: Brandenburg Gate Spread
brandenburg_gate.description: A setting of an article on the Brandenburg Gate in Berlin, featuring a typographical illustration of the horseman’s scepter.

images.alt: Brandenburg Gate Spread by Andy Griffin

chinese_warrior.title: Chinese Warrior
chinese_warrior.description: An illustration of a Chinese archer commissioned by Easton Archery, the foremost archery sporting goods supplier for the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing that was etched into a gold lapel pin for trading.

images.alt: Chinese Warrior Illustration by Andy Griffin

cinema_sign.title: Cinema Sign
cinema_sign.description: An electric sign I designed and built to imitate art-deco neon movie theater signs. It involved heavy design research, detailed construction schematics, woodworking, and electrical engineering and circuitry using electroluminescent wire.

images.alt: Neon Cinema Sign by Andy Griffin
Neon Cinema Sign Under Construction by Andy Griffin

creche.title: Christmas Crèche Exhibit
creche.description: A website I redesigned and improved for the annual nativity gallery in Palo Alto. The site is updated with both new content and a freshened design to match other marketing materials each year. I have both designed and coded the site each year since 2016.

images.alt: Christmas Crèche Exhibit Homepage by Andy Griffin

cyber_warfare.title: Cyber Warfare
cyber_warfare.description: A public exhibit comprised of both a wide-format infographic banner and an interactive web app that educate on both international and individual cyber security pitfalls and best practices. I designed the infographic and its curved display mechanism, and both designed and coded the web app.

images.alt: Cyber Warfare Infographic Banner by Andy Griffin
Cyber Warfare Infographic Detail by Andy Griffin
Cyber Warfare Webapp Screens by Andy Griffin
Cyber Warfare Exhibit by Andy Griffin

e_t.title: E.T.
e_t.description: A halloween pumpkin I sculpted and airbrushed to resemble E.T. from Steven Spielberg’s famous 1982 film of the same name.

images.alt: E.T. Pumpkin Sculpture by Andy Griffin
E.T. Pumpkin Sculpture Unpainted by Andy Griffin

evil_elk.title: Evil Elk Skull
evil_elk.description: An illustration of an elk skull created for use on a hunting arrow wrap for Easton Archery.

images.alt: Evil Elk Skull Illustration by Andy Griffin

faux_fox.title: Faux Fox
faux_fox.description: An illustrative logo for a fictional taxidermy company.

images.alt: Faux Fox Logo by Andy Griffin

first_light.title: First Light
first_light.description: An artwork that combines wood relief with stained glass styles to represent the central figures in the nativity story. A laser cutter was employed to cut and etch the designs in woods and colored acrylics. The piece is backlit with programmable LEDs in a custom diffuser box.

images.alt: First Light Sculpture by Andy Griffin
First Light Sculpture Piece from Laser Cutter by Andy Griffin
First Light Sculpture Under Construction by Andy Griffin

gift_box.title: Gift Box
gift_box.description: A vector illustration of a gift box made for an e-commerce holiday promotion.

images.alt: Gift Box Illustration by Andy Griffin

griffin_firepit.title: Griffin Firepit
griffin_firepit.description: A large, rectangular, Griffin-themed fire pit with built-in seating designed and built for maximum seating capacity, comfort, and tool storage.

images.alt: Griffin Firepit by Andy Griffin
Glimmer Firepit Detail by Andy Griffin

happy_place.title: Happy Place
happy_place.description: An illustration that combines a building or location from each Pixar movie in one diverse cityscape.

images.alt: Happy Place Pixar Cityscape Illustration by Andy Griffin
Happy Place Pixar Cityscape Illustration by Andy Griffin

hobby_heap.title: Hobby Heap
hobby_heap.description: A logo with a vintage appliance feel for a service meant to help its users discover new meaningful pastimes.

images.alt: Hobby Heap Logo by Andy Griffin

holiday_beacon.title: Holiday Beacon
holiday_beacon.description: This edge-lit acrylic sign was designed to celebrate special occasions with a sleek beam of colored light. Interchangeable acrylic slabs feature designs for various special occasions that rest in a sturdy, angular walnut base. LED lighting allows for a range of color options to complement the occasion.

images.alt: Holiday Beacon Edge-lit Acrylic Sign by Andy Griffin
Holiday Beacon Edge-lit Acrylic Sign by Andy Griffin
Holiday Beacon Edge-lit Acrylic Sign by Andy Griffin
Holiday Beacon Edge-lit Acrylic Sign by Andy Griffin

johnson_firepit.title: Johnson Firepit
johnson_firepit.description: A fire pit with built-in seating constructed of reclaimed brick as part of a larger backyard transformation for a family seeking a yard more hospitable to gathering and family time.

images.alt: Johnson Firepit by Andy Griffin
Johnson Firepit Rendering by Andy Griffin
Wore out gloves while building Johnson Firepit by Andy Griffin

johnson_sandbox.title: Johnson Sandbox
johnson_sandbox.description: A sandbox with a built-in chalkboard, sun shade, and multi-purpose sliding cover that functions also as bench seating and a play deck. I began with a 3D rendering, and did all the construction work myself.

images.alt: Johnson Sandbox by Andy Griffin
Johnson Sandbox 3D Rendering by Andy Griffin
Johnson Sandbox in Use by Andy Griffin
Johnson Sandbox Under Construction by Andy Griffin
Johnson Sandbox in Use by Andy Griffin

lanturn.title: Lanturn
lanturn.description: An illuminated kinetic sculpture designed as a wedding table centerpiece. Candles within the upper basket both expel light and generate heat to spin the turbine. Digitally designed, cut from slabs of walnut by laser cutter, and reproduced for placement on each table at the party.

images.alt: Lanturn Kinetic Light Sculpture by Andy Griffin
Lanturn Kinetic Light Sculpture by Andy Griffin

mayfield.title: Mayfield Singers
mayfield.description: For a number of years, I’ve built and expanded the brand system for this chamber choir — including the logo, website, signage, concert advertising, program leaflets and more. The website, which I both design and code, includes a custom music player and a donation feature.

images.alt: Mayfield Singers Homepage by Andy Griffin
Concert Invitations for Mayfield Singers by Andy Griffin

nien_nunb.title: Nien Nunb
nien_nunb.description: A halloween pumpkin I sculpted and airbrushed to resemble Nien Nunb, a character featured in the Star Wars franchise.

images.alt: Nien Nunb Pumpkin Sculpture by Andy Griffin
Nien Nunb Pumpkin Sculpture Before Paint by Andy Griffin

north_magazine.title: North Magazine
north_magazine.description: An online publishing platform for an organization seeking to provide education and awareness on suicide and behavioral health. I both designed and coded the site based on an existing content management system. Heavy emphasis was placed on typographical design as a main element. Illustrations by Geraldine Sy and Tayrine Cruz.

images.alt: North Magazine Homepage by Andy Griffin
North Magazine Article by Andy Griffin

penetration.title: Penetration
penetration.description: An illustration meant to demonstrate the penetrating power of a hunting arrow used in several consecutive annual Easton Archery product catalogs.

images.alt: Penetration Illustration by Andy Griffin

pinwheel.title: Pinwheel
pinwheel.description: A logo developed for a fictional password security service.

images.alt: Pinwheel Logo by Andy Griffin

pixar_portal.title: Pixar Portal
pixar_portal.description: A website I designed and coded that reports on news and rumors related to Pixar Animation Studios.

images.alt: Pixar Portal Homepage by Andy Griffin
Pixar Portal Mobile by Andy Griffin
Pixar Portal Movie Page by Andy Griffin

radical.title: RadiCal
radical.description: A working calendar app prototype that visualizes the day’s appointments in a clock-like display. It won first place in the Information Technology category of the Research and Creative Works Conference at BYU-Idaho.

images.alt: RadiCal Calendar App by Andy Griffin

tongue_head.title: Tongue Head
tongue_head.description: A whimsical illustration that emerged when unrelated logo exploration sketches produced some unexpected shapes.

images.alt: Tongue Head Illustration by Andy Griffin

voi.title: Voi
voi.description: A homepage design developed for a company working in suicide prevention. A desire to incorporate humanity and storytelling drove this design to replace a page that was originally product and sales-heavy. I both designed the page and wrote the content.

images.alt: Voi Homepage by Andy Griffin

warthen_50.title: Warthen 50th
warthen_50.description: An illustration commissioned for use on a T-shirt commemorating a 50th wedding anniversary. For decades, the family operated a Buick dealership, so the illustration features a 1968 Buick Skylark.

images.alt: Warthen 50 Illustration by Andy Griffin
Warthen 50 T-shirt by Andy Griffin

wedding.title: Chloe & Andy’s Wedding
wedding.description: A website, logo, printed invitations, laser-cut party favors, and signage as part of a brand system developed for my wedding when my wife, Chloe, and I got married.

images.alt: Wedding Logo by Andy Griffin
Wedding Sign by Andy Griffin
Wedding Invitation by Andy Griffin
Wedding Coasters by Andy Griffin
Wedding Website RSVP Page by Andy Griffin

x_10.title: X10 Arrow
x_10.description: A logo designed for the rebranding of a top-selling target arrow from Easton Archery.

images.alt: X10 Arrow Wrap Logo by Andy Griffin

you_twit.title: You Twit
you_twit.description: A logo meme featuring a scrawny cartoon bird that emerged from a literal pen scribble on some scratch paper.
